name: ELEX Minimum Order Amount for WooCommerce
author: ELEXtensions

sections.description:
ELEX WooCommerce Minimum Order Amount plugin helps you to configure minimum and maximum order amount based on WordPress user roles.
WooCommerce Minimum Order Amount plugin allows you to display custom messages to the end customer when restrictions are applied.
If you have any custom requirement on restricting WooCommerce minimum order, please feel to contact ELEX Development Services explaining your business case.
If you have any queries please contact ELEX support

ELEX Premium Plugins You May Be Interested In

  • WooCommerce Dynamic Pricing and Discounts Plugin
  • Wholesale & Role Based Pricing
  • WooCommerce Advanced Bulk Edit Products, Prices & Attributes
  • ELEX Hide WooCommerce Shipping Methods
  • ELEX Address Validation & Google Address Autocomplete Plugin for WooCommerce
  • ELEX WooCommerce Shipping Calculator, Purchase Shipping Label & Tracking for Customers
  • WooCommerce Google Shopping Integration

About ELEXtensions

We are a group of WordPress and WooCommerce enthusiasts with a vision to solve genuine problems related to WordPress & WooCommerce stores.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress.
  3. That’s it! you can now configure the plugin.
sections.faq:
1.What if I face issues with the plugin? Do you provide support for free products?
If you are facing any issues, please create a topic at plugin support section on wordpress org. Our team will respond back soon.
